t: SCREAMING FEMALES - Ugly - Amazon.com Music
s: As a fan of rock more so than pop ... by the Screaming Females. This album however is one of my favorites, chock full of heart-pounding, bone-shredding, riff-driven rock. The vocals have an irreverent, atonal, punk quality to them that is powerful but takes some getting used to. The jet-powered guitar riffs on the other hand are immediately catchy. t: Screaming Females - All At Once
s: Marissa Paternoster the (Screaming Female herself) delivers a very unique and distinctive vocal style along with her guitar playing. Just something very interesting in they way she sounds. There’s definitely something more than indie rock going on here (whatever it is I like it). I listen to some songs on a regular basis (streaming online), so only seems appropriate I add the vinyl ...

t: Screaming Females - Baby Teeth (BLUE VINYL) - Amazon.com Music
s: A remastered version of the very first Screaming Females album, originally self-recorded and self-released in 2006. Includes such hit singles as “Dinosaurs,” “Baby Jesus” and “Foul Mouth.” An instant classic. A1. Foul Mouth A2. Electric Pilgrim A3.

t: SCREAMING FEMALES - Power Move - Amazon.com Music
s: Screaming Females bring the sweaty intensity of basement punk to a new level with their third and most scorching full-length, Power Move. Their urgent vocals, gritty guitar solos, and iron-strong rhythms have garnered the attention of Spin Magazine, Maximum Rock n Roll, and everyone in-between.

t: Amazon.com: Live at the Hideout: CDs & Vinyl
s: On their way to recording Live at the Hideout, Screaming Females lost control of their van. As they slid backwards down the frozen Interstate, they locked eyes with another driver, headed their way. In a blink, a semi-truck smashed into her minivan.
